description: Try our easy to follow Ham Pizza + Snacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Ham Pizza + Snacks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs tomato paste no added salt (for pizza)
40g boneless leg ham, shaved, sliced (for pizza)

recipeInstructions.text: Pizza Triangles: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper.
Place pita on prepared tray and spread evenly with tomato paste. Top with ham, capsicum and cheese.

Bake for 8-10 minutes or until golden and crisp. Set aside to cool completely. Cut into triangles and keep covered in fridge until ready to use. Wrap half the pizza triangles in plastic wrap or place in a small airtight container. Pack next to frozen drink or cool brick in lunch box to keep cool. Snack: 150g Greek-style yoghurt topped with 2 tsp sultanas.
